FixturesGet.name: FixturesGet
FixturesGet.description:
Model that returns fixture list for a tournament or user.
Lists all matches that are still to be played.

Login.name: Login
Login.description: Login model for logging into the system.

Logout.name: Logout
Logout.description: Logout model called when the user logs out.

Register.name: Register
Register.description: Register model used to register onto the system.

ResultEnter.name: ResultEnter
ResultEnter.description: Model used for entering a result.

ResultGet.name: ResultGet
ResultGet.description: Model for retrieving information on a particular result.

Status.name: Status
Status.description: Model for getting the status of the current user.

TournamentCreate.name: TournamentCreate
TournamentCreate.description: Model for users to create tournaments.

TournamentGet.name: TournamentGet
TournamentGet.description: Model that fetches tournament data based on id.

TournamentLeagueTable.name: TournamentLeagueTable
TournamentLeagueTable.description: Class for generating a league table.

TournamentManagerAttach.name: TournamentManagerAttach
TournamentManagerAttach.description: Model for adding a user as a manager of a tournament.

TournamentManagerRemove.name: TournamentManagerRemove
TournamentManagerRemove.description: Model for removing a league manager from a tournament.

TournamentPlayerAttach.name: TournamentPlayerAttach
TournamentPlayerAttach.description: Model for adding a user as a player to a tournament.

TournamentPlayerRemove.name: TournamentPlayerRemove
TournamentPlayerRemove.description: Model for removing a player from a tournament.

TournamentSearch.name: TournamentSearch
TournamentSearch.description: Model that is used to search for a tournament by name.

UserGet.name: UserGet
UserGet.description: Model for querying a user based on the id.

UserRatings.name: UserRatings
UserRatings.description: Model when called will return all the user's ratings over time.

UserSearch.name: UserSearch
UserSearch.description: Model that is used to search for a user.

UserUpdate.name: UserUpdate
UserUpdate.description: This model is used to update user details.

API.name: API
API.description: Allows the JavaScript to communicate with the PHP models.

Database.name: Database
Database.description: The Database class connects the the database when the file is included.

Model.name: Model
Model.description:
Model class, the class is extended by all models.
It provides a foundation for all models.

EloRating.name: EloRating
EloRating.description: Class with functions for calculating new elo rating.

ResultMethods.name: ResultMethods
ResultMethods.description: Helpful functions for dealing with results.

Tournament.name: Tournament
Tournament.description: Parent class for general tournament stuff.

TournamentManagerAlter.name: TournamentManagerAlter
TournamentManagerAlter.description: Parent class of classes that add or remove league managers.

TournamentPlayerAlter.name: TournamentPlayerAlter
TournamentPlayerAlter.description: Parent class of classes that add or remove players.

Validate.name: Validate
Validate.description: Class used to validate input text.
